title: pc 26 March - 12 noon Counter-information Rossoperaia short suspension of publication - resumes normally on Tuesday 2 April
content:
Occasion to listen to the latest numbers in the last numbers - info/contacts/contributions pcro.red@gmail.com

PC 22 March - 12 noon Counter-information Rossoperaia - Palermo: against war and repression / from Fincantieri / women workers speak out

PC March 21 - 12 noon counter -information Rosso Operaia - still on Palestine - situation in factories - The importance of worker training

PC 20 March - 12 noon counter -information Rosso Opera - Meloni's journey to Egypt: imperialist interests/support for dictatorship/blocking of migrants

pc 19 March - 12 noon Counter-information Rossoperaia - The Paris Commune and the struggle for workers' power - The women of the Commune

PC March 15 - 12 noon Rosso Operase - ex -Ilva: the autonomous struggle of the workers in the contract - Stellantis: from Mirafiori to Melfi, against the masters/government - workers and unitary struggle and unitary struggle starts again.

PC 14 March - 12 noon Rossusoia counter -information - 5 workers who died in a single day! - Leonardo: profits and war

PC 13 March - 12 noon counter -information Rossusia - from Palestine to our house: genocide/war/repression. Advance in the proletarian and popular mobilization!

pc 12 March - 12 noon Counter-information Rossoperaia - The role and action of the MFPR in the days of struggle and mobilization of women on 8 and 9 March - Anan Yaeesh free! - On European rearmament

author: maoist
